vsParam:
Huh, is that Logy... in front of the warehouse?
Hey~ Logy! What are you doing?

Hey, someone asked me to check the inventory
of materials for the Alchemy class...

Check the inventory?
Bergamot Sensei just loves to ask students to run errands?

No, I offered to help.
I'd feel apologetic if I stay here and do nothing.

Anyway, I've checked the inventory.|
The materials for the next lesson may not be enough.

I must inform Bergamot Sensei,
and I'll go collect some.

Oh...
How many materials are there, to be exact?
It's all here, I drafted this list.

Okay... I know where we can collect these materials.
Let's go together!

No, I am very happy to hear that.
You still have a lesson, right? And the assignment——
Which material should we collect first?
It would be troublesome if the material is not enough!

What? Ah, the biggest shortage is this one...
Hey, wait. You need to study——

Although the inventory is running low, it may still be enough,
I should send someone who's free to do this——

To improve the efficiency, we better go collect now.
And then here and there...

Hey, wait. You still have a lesson.
You don't have to do this with me...

Don't forget to bring the basket!
Ah, we can collect more of this herb, [px]

Hey, what are you doing standing there, Logy!
We'll go without you!
Guys... Please listen when I talk.

... Thank you for helping.
The collection is done earlier with your assistance.
Hee hee, it's just a simple thing I we do it together!

Yeah. You had to study...
I'll make it up for you.

Alright!
Logy, you are being too serious!

No, this is not being serious,
I think it's pretty normal...

No, I hope that you can be more casual when you are with us,
after all, we are about the same age.

Thank you for saying that,
but I am not a student. I am just supporting you.
Even so, you are also a member of the Academy!

No, although I am also in the Academy,
my occupation is not like yours.

Strangers...
That's not what I meant...

Alright! [px]'s right!
Logy is already our comrade!

... I see.
I'll take care of it.

See, your reply is very inflexible!
You got to relax, and reply things like "Oh!"!

N, never mind...
We should respect Logy's will...

No!
I am not going to let him go before he answers "Oh!"!

H, ha-ha... Your tough attitude
reminds me of one colleague...
